content: Threaded rod coupler (imperial) Electrogalvanized threaded rod coupler (imperial) ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Standard fixings for support systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features Ability to join two threaded fasteners and create an extension Available in various sizes Applications Fixing and fastening Recommended for structural and mechanical assemblies Recommended for indoor environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material composition: Carbon steel - ASTM A563 Grade A Surface finish: Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Material composition | Carbon steel - ASTM A563 Grade A | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) ### ITEMS- 411748 - Zinc rod coupler 1/2 - Package Size 50 pc - 411746 - Zinc rod coupler 1/4 - Package Size 100 pc - 411750 - Zinc rod coupler 3/4 - Package Size 25 pc - 411747 - Zinc rod coupler 3/8 - Package Size 50 pc - 411749 - Zinc rod coupler 5/8 - Package Size 50 pc
